thread.title: Modern boutique hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Modern boutique hotel, great location - Review of Mercure London Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CanadianWorldTraveller
title: Modern boutique hotel, great location
text: Stayed there for 7 days. Mercure London bridge is all you need for a comfortable Business trip. Walking distance to London Bridge station, borough market, millennium bridge, nice restaraunt (Swan at Shakespeare's Globe). Breakfast is so-so. I went to The Table Cafe right next door, which is fantastic.
